titles.title: Commemorating the 50th anniversary of Cascade Head Preserve, an Oregon natural icon.
Commemorating the 50th anniversary of Cascade Head Preserve, an Oregon natural icon.

committee.name: House Natural Resources

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations
Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
Commemorates the 50th anniversary of the Cascade Head Preserve in Oregon.
Applauds the outstanding commitment of the Preserve's stewards, naturalists, volunteers, and community leaders in protecting the ecological significance of the Preserve and in supporting the local economy through tourism, recreation, and local livelihoods.
